# ssid

**Instance Property**

The SSID of the accessory’s Wi-Fi network.

## Declaration

```swift
var ssid: String? { get set }
```

## Specifying Wi-Fi properties

- **ssidPrefix**: The prefix string of SSID of the accessory’s Wi-Fi network.
